scripts.ut: bun test scripts/test --coverage --coverage-reporter=text --coverage-reporter=lcov && bun run scripts/coverage-check.ts && cd dashboard && bun run ut
scripts.ut:scripts: bun test scripts/test --coverage --coverage-reporter=text --coverage-reporter=lcov && bun run scripts/coverage-check.ts
scripts.lint: eslint . --ext .ts && cd dashboard && bun run lint
scripts.precommit: bun run ut && bun run lint
